title: Meet Joyce Kim, Rare Beauty's Chief Product Officer, Live on the Fashionista Network
description: Brooke here. I'm so excited to share that I'll be joining Joyce Kim, Chief Product Officer of Rare Beauty, on The Fashionista Network. But here's the best part: I want you to join me! It's your opportunity to interact live with us, ask questions and be part of the show. We'll discuss Joyce's ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
